column5: Been very cold here but seems we are going to get a break in weather.Heres the Dam in Eagle River.Was frozen but opened up again.And the ladies in Eagle River got the st.Patricks day decorations up.Sure sign of spring here.
Looks good, I'm ready for spring, can't wait to get on the water!
Yup its time.BUT 2 more months till ice out.Long wait yet.But good weather coming so will have nice ice time.
Flowing water looks great up there. Less than 80 more days and finally no more regulations to deal with to cross the border so I hope they have a bumper year!

Love open water.Be sooner for me.Hoping for some early ice out so I can trout fish from the boat.looking like maybe low water this year.Not much water coming out of the dam and not much snow.Lots of other rivers pretty low.
No sand bagging this year,they don't want to go that sht ever again!!
